doc.field: A Gathering of the Tribes Records
A Gathering of the Tribes Records

This series contains files created by A Gathering of the Tribes for the operation of their gallery, performance space, magazine, and the imprint, Fly By Night Press. This series contains administrative files including an organizational history, by-laws, press clippings, and correspondence. Exhibition files and lists are in this series, as well as artist submission packets sent from those who have exhibited or wished to exhibit in the Tribes gallery space. Artist packets typically contain bios sheets, resumes, exhibit catalogs, and artwork images. Promotional material and event calendars date from 1995 to 2013, and are complemented by guest books and files for individual events, including the Charlie Parker Festival. Fly By Night Press files include royalty statements, writer submissions, mockups for the publication Catweazle NYC, and files related to Anyssa Kim and the publishing of her 2003 book Ovarian Twists: New and Selected Poems. Files related to the publication A Gathering of the Tribes include cover designs, layouts for issues #7-9, writer submissions, as well as mock-ups and page layouts for the 10th anniversary edition.
A Gathering of the Tribes Records
